# registeredDraggedTypes

**Instance Property**

The array of pasteboard drag types that the view can accept.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var registeredDraggedTypes: [NSPasteboard.PasteboardType] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains an array of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] objects, each of which corresponds to a [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Conceptual/DevPedia-CocoaCore/UniformTypeIdentifier.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40008195-CH60]. The array elements are in no particular order, but the array is guaranteed not to contain duplicate entries. To register your view’s drag types, use the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/registerForDraggedTypes(_:)] method.

## Dragging Operations

- **registerForDraggedTypes(_:)**: Registers the pasteboard types that the view will accept as the destination of an image-dragging session.
- **unregisterDraggedTypes()**: Unregisters the view as a possible destination in a dragging session.
- **beginDraggingSession(with:event:source:)**: Initiates a dragging session with a group of dragging items.
- **shouldDelayWindowOrdering(for:)**: Allows the user to drag objects from the view without activating the app or moving the window of the view forward, possibly obscuring the destination.
